quotations.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
Find something you love to do, and you'll never have to work a day in your life.
Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
When you love what you do, you'll never work a day in your life.
Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
The only way to do great work is to do what you love.
Do what you love, and you'll never work a day in your life.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
Follow your passion; it will lead you to your purpose.
Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
